about_the_game:
Pineford has been rocked by disaster: everyone's favourite aristocrat, Evie Roots, has been found dead. This place far from the civilised world seems quiet and peaceful… but only at first glance.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a provincial town in a Victorian world setting. Pineford survived the plague epidemic, rebellions and intrigues of the ruling families. It is in your hands to put all the events in place and understand how they led to such a high-profile murder.

Start exploring detective history in the preview version of the game, which includes the prologue and part of the first act of the main game.

Pineford has been rocked by disaster: everyone's favourite aristocrat, Evie Roots, has been found dead. This place far from the civilised world seems quiet and peaceful… but only at first glance.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a provincial town in a Victorian world setting. Pineford survived the plague epidemic, rebellions and intrigues of the ruling families. It is in your hands to put all the events in place and understand how they led to such a high-profile murder.

The release is planned in chapters, with the story unfolding gradually.


Everyone in the city holds its own secrets, it is your mission to find out. However, sometimes the clue may lead to a very different place than where you were originally headed…


.
Pineford is ruled by three great houses, whose members are linked in their own way to the victim and to each other. The intertwined destinies form a tangle of tangles for you to sort out.


.
An unknown person has sent the detective this mysterious locket. Its purpose will have to be figured out by you. However, having understood the logic of the device, do not hurry to trust the cerum, because it is not clear who sent it: friend or foe?



  • 13 Characters (more than 25 In Subsequent Chapters);
  • 20 original compositions;
  • Duration of the first chapter is approximately 5 hours;
  • Investigation Log;
  • Activatable item - cerum;
